name: Ribosome profiling analysis framework
tagline: Ribosome profiling analysis framework as described in de Klerk E., Fokkema I.F.A.C et al (2015).
body:
### Ribosome profiling analysis framework
This ribosome profiling analysis framework has been described in de Klerk E., Fokkema I.F.A.C et al (2015).
It features read alignment, checking of triplet periodicity, discovering translation initiation sites (TISs), analysis of TIS motifs and translation of upstream open reading frames (uORFs).

This analysis framework is maintained by @ifokkema.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
